event.description: Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a ground ball to center fielder Melky Cabrera.
With Dustin Pedroia batting, Jacoby Ellsbury steals (15) 2nd base.
Dustin Pedroia singles on a ground ball to left fielder Johnny Damon. Jacoby Ellsbury to 3rd.
David Ortiz singles on a line drive to center fielder Melky Cabrera. Jacoby Ellsbury scores. Dustin Pedroia to 2nd.
Jason Bay homers (7) on a fly ball to left field. Dustin Pedroia scores. David Ortiz scores.
Mike Lowell singles on a ground ball to left fielder Johnny Damon.
J. D. Drew lines out to right fielder Nick Swisher.
Jeff Bailey grounds into a double play, pitcher Joba Chamberlain to second baseman Robinson Cano to first baseman Mark Teixeira. Mike Lowell out at 2nd.
